allow: Bash(sudo -S strace -f -e trace=mount,chroot,clone,fork,execve,write -o /tmp/rustbox_strace.log timeout 10 target/debug/judge execute-code --strict --box-id 1 --language python --code 'print\(""hello""\)')

Bash(sudo -S bash -c 'strace -f -e trace=mount,chroot,clone,clone3,fork,execve,unshare,pivot_root -o /tmp/rustbox_strace2.log target/debug/judge execute-code --strict --box-id 1 --language python --code ""print\(\\""hello\\""\)"" &

sleep 12
kill -9 $BGPID 2>/dev/null
wait $BGPID 2>/dev/null

sleep 12
kill -9 $BGPID 2>/dev/null
wait $BGPID 2>/dev/null
